content.text: I'm happy that you're spending time with your grandparents.
Thank you. I'd love to visit them more, but I live too far away.
I understand. I'm from San Francisco.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been there.
It's a great city! I love the bay area.
I'm sure it is. What are some of your favorite things to do there?
Well, I love to go to the beach and visit the museums.
That sounds really nice. I like going to the beach too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to swim and I play the guitar.
That's great! I love swimming too. I don't play any instruments though.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing when I was 12 years old.
I'm not sure if I have the patience for it.
It's not as hard as it looks!
Maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
